pull.title: depends: Allow PATH with spaces in directory names.
pull.body: The goal of this PR is to help close https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28733. I reverted the change on `depends/config.guess` based on the feedback provided in the previous PR. I've also incorporated the test mentioned by maflcko

events.message:
[depends] Allow PATH with spaces in directory names.

added test and update code based on feedback
